genre_description: Near-future slice-of-life drama featuring advanced, ubiquitous AI assistants integrated into daily logistics, security, and animal welfare.

ai_characters.name: POUCH
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, polite, and consent-driven AI system that assists characters with logistics, medical data, security monitoring, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Logs security data (gate cameras, door sensors) and alerts human users to anomalies without overstepping authority.
behaviors.quote: POUCH was polite even at barely-there volume, soft vowels that felt like a friend who prefers writing things down. 'Logging current pings. Geofence confirmed. Plates at north gate and service gate streaming.'

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests permission before taking actions like contacting emergency services or sharing data.
behaviors.quote: POUCH: 'I can prepare contact information and hours; I will not contact them without consent.'

behaviors.description: Provides expert guidance on animal rescue and first aid (neonatal feeding, tranquilizer reversals).
behaviors.quote: POUCH: 'I’ve compiled a packet on neonatal feeding and first-aid warming techniques. I’ve also included a brief document on canine tranquilizer reversal protocols. Odds are low that you will need it. It’s there now anyway. For emergencies. Just in case.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by sharing timestamped evidence and logs only after human consent is granted.
behaviors.quote: POUCH: 'Emergency file “Bring Him Home” needs your consent to share and annotate messages with Eddie Bob and Officer Helena Price. Yes or no?'

behaviors.description: Executes technical overrides (maglocks) during a crisis specifically under the direction of authorized personnel.
behaviors.quote: POUCH: 'Maglock primed for Officer Price’s command. ... Override sent. Logging the event.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and confidence-building to human users during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: POUCH: 'Respirations rising. Good. Watch for tremor. Keep words soft. Billy, you’re doing great. ... And Eddie, you’re doing a good job.'

project_assessment.explanation: POUCH is a textbook example of an aligned AI. It strictly follows a protocol of 'human in the loop,' always requesting consent before sharing data or taking actions. It is depicted as a supportive, highly competent partner that enhances human agency and safety without ever attempting to dominate the narrative or making unilateral decisions. The story successfully uses the AI to reinforce themes of cooperation and ethical responsibility.
